scenarios.name: Blue Chip 6-Month Hold
scenarios.description: Buy & hold large-cap growers for 180 days. No TP/SL.

scenarios.name: Buy & Hold (6 Months)
scenarios.description: Buy and hold for 126 trading days (~6 months).

scenarios.name: Cursor Genius 20% TP
scenarios.description: Dip-buying winners with 20% take-profit. Best risk-adjusted Sharpe.

scenarios.name: Blue Chip 90-Day Hold
scenarios.description: Buy & hold large-cap growers for 90 days. No TP/SL.

scenarios.name: Cursor Genius 90-Day Hold
scenarios.description: Data-driven dip-buying on top performers. 90-day hold, no TP/SL.

scenarios.name: ETF Masters 90-Day Hold
scenarios.description: Diversified ETF portfolio across 5 tiers. 90-day hold, no TP/SL.

scenarios.name: Sector Rotation 90-Day
scenarios.description: Equal-weight all 11 GICS sectors. Monthly rebalance, 90-day hold.

scenarios.name: Cursor Genius 50% TP
scenarios.description: Dip-buying winners with 50% take-profit cap over 90 days.

scenarios.name: Buy & Hold (3 Months)
scenarios.description: Buy and hold for 60 trading days (~3 months).

scenarios.name: Sector Momentum 30-Day
scenarios.description: Top 4 momentum sectors each month. 30-day hold for rotation.

scenarios.name: Blue Chip 30-Day Hold
scenarios.description: Buy & hold large-cap growers for 30 days. No TP/SL.

scenarios.name: Momentum Ride
scenarios.description: Let winners run. 50% TP, 10% trailing SL, 30 days.

scenarios.name: Aggressive Swing
scenarios.description: Hold 2-4 weeks, wide stops. 30% TP, 15% SL.

scenarios.name: Conservative Swing
scenarios.description: Hold 2-4 weeks, tight stops. 10% TP, 5% SL.

scenarios.name: Weekly Hold (20% Target)
scenarios.description: Hold up to 7 days, sell at 20% profit or 8% loss.

scenarios.name: Weekly Hold (10% Target)
scenarios.description: Hold up to 7 days, sell at 10% profit or 5% loss.

scenarios.name: Day Trader (2-Day Max)
scenarios.description: Buy in morning, sell within 2 days. 5% SL, 10% TP.

scenarios.name: Day Trader (EOD Exit)
scenarios.description: Buy at open, sell at close same day. Max 1-day hold.

scenarios.name: Tight Scalp
scenarios.description: Quick 3% profit target, 2% stop loss, 1 day max.
